// Reformatted form of https://github.com/phase/sbhs/issues/7#issuecomment-402008379
// With double / comments and some more line breaks to make it look more consistent

// 0x52F7C Idle 00
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 10 00 04 1F 00 00 00 10 00 00 00 02 00 10 00 12 00 D0 00 11 00 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 03 
00 F0 FF 01 00 00 10 06 
00 F0 FF 02 00 00 10 08 
00 F0 FF 03 00 00 10 0A 
00 F0 FF 04 00 00 10 0C 
00 F0 FF 05 00 00 10 0D 
00 F0 FF 00 00 FE FF 
// (Normal Loop)

// 0x52FD4 Running 01
00 
00 F0 FF 00 02 10 00 10 00 12 00 D0 00 11 00 80 07 1F 00 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 08 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 0C 00 00 10 62 02 00 28 06
00 F0 FF 0D 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 0E 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 0F 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 10 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF 11 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF 12 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF 13 00 00 10 13
00 F0 FF 02  
00 F0 00 
// (Redirects to Stopping)

// 0x53044 Running Loop?  02
00 
00 F0 FF 0C 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 0D 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 0E 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF 0F 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 10 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 11 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 12 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF 13 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 00 00 FE FF
// (This bit doesn't have the animation 'data' of the first running bit, so I'm not sure what
// it's here for. Notably, this animation is an exception in the jump list.  Although it's
// listed third, the rest of the list only makes sense if this is skipped.)

// 0x5308C Stopping 03
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 14 00 00 10 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 02
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 15 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 16 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 17 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 00  
00 F0 00 
// (Redirects to Idle)

// 0x530C8 Dash 04
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 0E 01 00 80 00 11 00 00 0E 1F 00 68 00 02 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 1F 00 00 23 00 00 10 01 18 00 00 10 65 02 00 28 02
00 F0 FF 19 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 1A 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 1B 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 1C 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 1D 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF 1E 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 1D 00 00 10 0D
00 F0 FF 1E 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF 1D 00 00 10 0F
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00 00 10 00 06  
00 F0 00 
// (whaaaat is this and why is so long)

// 0x53158 Running Turn Around ??
00 
00 F0 FF 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 24 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 25 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 26 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF 27 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 01  
00 F0 00 (Redirects to Running)

// 0x5318C Standing Turning Around 05
00 
00 F0 FF 00 01 10 00 80 07 1F 00 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 00 00 24 00 20 00 00 10 01
00 F0 FF 21 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 22 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF 00  
00 F0 00 
// (Redirects to Idle)

// 0x531C0 Falling 06
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00 01 10 00 10 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 80 05 1F 00 00 00 24 00 18 00 33 00 B4 00 34 00 28 00 00 10 02 00 F0 FF 29 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 2A 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 2B 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 2A 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 2B 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 2A 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF 2B 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF 2A 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF 2B 00 00 10 13
00 F0 FF 00 00 FE FF 
// (Normal Loop)

// 0x53238 Jumping 07
00 
00 F0 FF 80 00 10 00 A8 00 02 00 10 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 80 05 1F 00 00 00 24 00 2C 00 00 10 68 02 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 2D 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 2E 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF 2F 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 30 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 06  
00 F0 00 
// (Redirects to Falling)

// 0x53284 Landing 08
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 12 00 80 01 11 00 00 06 1F 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 10 01 34 00 00 10 6B 02 00 28 03
00 F0 FF 35 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF 36 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00  
00 F0 00 
// (Redirects to Idle.  I'm not sure what the additional data here is for.)

// 0x532C0 Air Dash 09
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 00 00 FF 00 00 10 01 00 80 00 11 00 80 07 1F 00 80 00 02 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 20 00 00 23 38 00 00 10 25 03 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 39 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 3A 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 3B 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 3C 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 3D 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 3E 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 06  
00 F0 00 
// (Redirects to Falling.)

// 0x53334 Punch One 0A
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 40 00 00 10 08 00 00 11 6E 02 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 41 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 40 01 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 24 00 23 00 D0 00 24 00 05 00 27 00 01 00 25 00 02 00 26 00 42 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 43 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 44 00 00 10 00 00 20 01 08
00 F0 FF 45 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00  
00 F0 00

// 0x533AC Punch Two 0B
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 48 00 00 10 08 00 00 11 6E 02 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 49 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 40 01 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 24 00 23 00 D0 00 24 00 08 00 27 00 01 00 25 00 02 00 26 00 4A 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 4B 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 4C 00 00 10 00 00 20 01 09
00 F0 FF 4D 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00  
00 F0 00

// 0x53424 Punch Three 0C
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 50 00 00 10 08 00 00 11 6E 02 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 51 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 40 01 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 24 00 23 00 FF 00 24 00 0A 00 27 00 01 00 25 00 02 00 26 00 52 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 53 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 54 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 55 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 56 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 57 00 00 10 00 00 20 01 0F
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00  
00 F0 00

// 0x534AC Heavy Attack 0D
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 58 00 00 10 33 01 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 59 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 00 01 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 20 01 24 00 0F 00 27 00 02 00 25 00 03 00 26 00 5A 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 1E 00 00 23 04
00 F0 FF 5B 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 08 00 00 11 5C 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 11 5D 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 5E 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 5F 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 60 00 00 10 0D
00 F0 FF 61 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF 00 00 40 01 62 00 00 10 13
00 F0 FF 63 00 00 10 18
00 F0 FF 64 00 00 10 1B
00 F0 FF 65 00 00 10 1D
00 F0 FF 00 FD 01 00 80 00 02 00 20 00 11 00 18 00 12 00 20
00 F0 FF 66 00 00 10 22
00 F0 FF 67 00 00 10 24
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00 00 20 01 00  
00 F0 00

// 0x535A0 Uppercut
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 D0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 68 00 00 10 33 01 00 28 02
00 F0 FF 69 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 40 01 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 D0 00 24 00 0A 00 27 00 03 00 25 00 03 00 26 00 6A 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 6B 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 6C 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 6D 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 6E 00 00 10 0F
00 F0 FF 6F 00 00 10 13
00 F0 FF 70 00 00 10 15
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00 00 20 01 00  
00 F0 00

// 0x5362C Dash Attack
00 
00 F0 FF 60 00 02 00 74 00 00 10 6E 02 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 00 00 20 00 00 00 21
00 F0 FF 22 00 24 00 23 00 A0 01 24 00 0F 00 27 00 08 00 25 00 04 00 26 00 75 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 76 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 77 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 78 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF 79 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 7A 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 7B 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 7C 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 7D 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x536B0 Eagle Kick Pursuit Move
00 
00 F0 FF B0 00 02 00 0A 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 80 00 00 10 71 02 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 81 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 82 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 83 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 84 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF 83 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 84 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 83 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 84 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 83 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 84 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF 83 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 84 00 00 10 0D
00 F0 FF 83 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF 84 00 00 10 0F
00 F0 FF 83 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF 82 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF 30 00 00 10 13
00 F0 FF 29 00 00 10 14
00 F0 FF 0E 00 12 00 00 04 1F 00 28 00 00 10 15
00 F0 FF 2A 00 00 10 16
00 F0 FF 2B 00 00 10 17
00 F0 FF 2A 00 00 10 18
00 F0 FF 2B 00 00 10 19
00 F0 FF 2A 00 00 10 1A
00 F0 FF 2B 00 00 10 00 00 00 01 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x537A0 Eagle Kick
00 
00 F0 FF 88 00 00 10 6E 02 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 89 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 8A 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 8B 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 24 00 23 00 FF 00 24 00 0A 00 27 00 06 00 25 00 04 00 26 00 8C 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 8D 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 8E 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 8F 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF 90 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x53818 Different version of Eagle Kick?
00 
00 F0 FF 88 00 00 10 74 02 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 89 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 8A 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 50 FE 00 20 06 00 00 22 20 00 02 00 8B 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 24 00 23
00 FF 00 24 00 1E 00 27 00 07 00 25 00 04 00 26 00 8C 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 8D 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 8E 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 8F 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF 90 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 06  
00 F0 00 
// (This version is a bit different.  I'm not sure why.)

// 0x5389C Air Kick
00 
00 F0 FF 10 00 12 00 08 00 00 12 94 00 00 10 01
00 F0 FF 95 00 00 10 6E 02 00 28 03
00 F0 FF 00 00 20 00 00 00 21
00 F0 FF 22 00 10 00 23 00 FF 00 24 00 0A 00 27 00 06 00 25 00 02 00 26 00 96 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF A0 FF 01 00 40 00 02 00 97 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 98 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 99 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF 9A 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 06  
00 F0 00 
// (To Falling.)

// 0x53914 Shockwave Left/Right
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 24 25 00 00 23 00 00 20 00 00 00 21
00 F0 FF 22 00 10 00 23 00 A0 00 24 00 05 00 27 00 01 00 25 00 02 00 26 00 9C 00 00 10 2B 03 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 9D 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 9E 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 9F 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 9C 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 25 00 00 23 9D 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 9E 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 9E 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 9F 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 26 00 00 23 00 FD 01 00 A0 00 02 00 0E 00 12 00 10 00 11 00 A0 00 00 10 00 00 50 01 0A
00 F0 FF A1 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF A2 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF A3 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF A0 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF A1 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF A2 00 00 10 14
00 F0 FF A3 00 00 10 16
00 F0 FF A2 00 00 10 18
00 F0 FF A3 00 00 10 1A
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 00 00 00 01 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x53A20 Random Cut to a Fall?
00 
00 F0 FF 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x53A28 Another Random Cut to a Fall?
00 
00 F0 FF 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x53A30 More Data About Left/Right Spindash?
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 80 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 F8 FF 22 00 14 00 23 00 20 01 24 00 05 00 27 00 01 00 25 00 02 00 26 00 A2 00 00 10 2B 03 00 28 02
00 F0 FF A3 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 27 00 00 23 00 FE 01 00 60 00 02 00 10 00 11 00 A0 00 00 10 00 00 50 01 05
00 F0 FF A1 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF A2 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF A3 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF A0 00 00 10 0D
00 F0 FF A1 00 00 10 0F
00 F0 FF A2 00 00 10 11
00 F0 FF A3 00 00 10 13
00 F0 FF A0 00 00 10 15
00 F0 FF A1 00 00 10 17
00 F0 FF A2 00 00 10 19
00 F0 FF A3 00 00 10 1B
00 F0 FF A0 00 00 10 1D
00 F0 FF A1 00 00 10 1F
00 F0 FF A2 00 00 10 21
00 F0 FF A3 00 00 10 23
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 00 00 00 01 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x53B20 ??
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x53B2C Literally the same as above.
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x53B38 Ring Throw
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 24 22 00 00 23 B4 00 00 10 21 01 00 28 02
00 F0 FF B5 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF B6 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF B7 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF B8 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF 00 FF 00 20 08 00 00 22 23 00 00 23 0A
00 F0 FF B9 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF BA 00 00 10 0D
00 F0 FF BB 00 00 10 0F
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00  
00 F0 00

// 0x53BAC Shockwave Spindash Down
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 01 00 00 10 00 80 00 11 00 00 28 1F 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 60 01 24 00 3C 00 27 00 0A 00 25 00 05 00 26 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 1F 00 00 23 BC 00 00 10 29 03 00 28 00 00 50 01 02
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 1E 00 27 00 BD 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 0F 00 27 00 BE 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BF 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BD 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BE 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BF 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BD 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BE 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF BF 00 00 10 14
00 F0 FF BD 00 00 10 16
00 F0 FF BE 00 00 10 18
00 F0 FF BF 00 00 10 19
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 1A
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 03  
00 F0 00

00 
00 F0 FF 00  
00 F0 00

// 0x53CA0 Aerial Trap
00 
00 F0 FF D0 FF 02 00 80 00 12 00 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 20 01 24 00 14 00 27 00 0A 00 25 00 04 00 26 00 BF 00 00 10 2A 03 00 28 01
00 F0 FF 02 
// (Pardon???  why so short)
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 24 00 00 23 BD 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BE 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BF 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BD 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BE 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BF 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF 24 00 00 23 BD 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF BE 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF BF 00 00 10 14
00 F0 FF BD 00 00 10 16
00 F0 FF BE 00 00 10 18
00 F0 FF BF 00 00 10 1A
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 00 00 00 01 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x53D78 - Related to the Down Shockwave Special?
00 
00 F0 FF C0 00 02 00 A0 00 10 00 10 00 11 00 10 00 12 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 20 01 24 00 0A 00 27 00 0A 00 25 00 04 00 26 00 BD 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 24 00 00 23 BE 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 16 02 F0 00

// 0xB3DD0 Also related to the Shockwave Spindash Up special?
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 20 00 00 00 21 00 00 00 22 00 10 00 23 00 20 01 24 00 05 00 27 00 0A 00 25 00 04 00 26 00 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 24 00 00 23 BF 00 00 10 00 00 50 01 02
00 F0 FF BD 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF BE 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF BF 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 00 00 24 00 06  
00 F0 00

// 0x53E2C Grounded Trap
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 00 00 10 01 C8 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 24 2D 00 00 23 2A 01 00 28 03
00 F0 FF C9 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF CA 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF CB 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF CC 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF 00 FF 00 20 00 00 00 22 28 00 00 23 00 00 50 01 09
00 F0 FF CD 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF CE 00 00 10 0D
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00  
00 F0 00

00 F0 00

00 F0 00

// 0x53EBC Jumps between Idle, punching and Aerial Trap?  Really bizarre.
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 10 00 A0 00 11 00 60 00 02 00 09 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 D0 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 24 2E 00 00 23 2A 01 00 28 03
00 F0 FF D1 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF D2 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF 50 00 00
20 F0 FF 00 22 28 00 00 23 D3 00 00 10 00 00 50 01 09
00 F0 FF D4 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF D5 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF D6 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 06  
00 F0 00

00 F0 00

00 F0 FF DA 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00  
00 F0 00

// 0x53F8C Flung Backwards
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 EB 01 00 30 00 02 00 A8 00 11 00 04 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 DC 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 01
00 F0 FF DD 00 00 10 02
00 F0 FF DE 00 00 10 03
00 F0 FF DF 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF E0 00 00 10 05
00 F0 FF E1 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF E2 00 00 10 07
00 F0 FF E3 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF DE 00 00 10 09
00 F0 FF DF 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF E0 00 00 10 0B
00 F0 FF E1 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF E2 00 00 10 0D
00 F0 FF E3 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF DE 00 00 10 0F
00 F0 FF DF 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF E0 00 00 10 11
00 F0 FF E1 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF E2 00 00 10 13
00 F0 FF E3 00 00 10 14
00 F0 FF DE 00 00 10 15
00 F0 FF DF 00 00 10 16
00 F0 FF E0 00 00 10 17
00 F0 FF E1 00 00 10 18
00 F0 FF E2 00 00 10 19
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00 00 10 00 06  
00 F0 00 00
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 01 11 00 A0 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02
00 F0 FF E5 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF E4 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF E5 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF E4 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF E4 00 00 10 0C
00 F0 FF E5 00 00 10 0E
00 F0 FF E6 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF E7 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 06  
00 F0 00 00
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 01 11 00 60 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02
00 F0 FF E4 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF E5 00 00 10 06

// 0x54214 Getting Back Up
00 
00 F0 FF 00 FC 01 00 60 00 02 00 20 00 11 00 0E 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 F4 00 00 10 7F 02 00 28 02
00 F0 FF F5 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF F6 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF F7 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF F8 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF E8 00 00 10 00
01 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 34  
00 F0 00

// 0x54268 Also a 'getting back up' animation?
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 FA 01 00 60 00 02 00 08 00 11 00 0E 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 03 00 00 23 D8 00 00 10 7F 02 00 28 04
00 F0 FF D9 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF F5 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF F6 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF F7 00 00 10 14
00 F0 FF F8 00 00 10 00
01 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 34  
00 F0 00

// 0x542CC Falling the ground ouch style
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 80 FD 01 00 10 00 11 00 A0 00 02 00 0A 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 05 00 00 23 EC 00 00 10 82 02 00 28 02
00 F0 FF ED 00 00 10 04
00 F0 FF EC 00 00 10 06
00 F0 FF ED 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF EC 00 00 10 0A
00 F0 FF EE 00 00 10 0D
00 F0 FF EF 00 00 10 0F
00 F0 FF F0 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF F1 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF F2 00 00 10 14
00 F0 FF F1 00 00 10 16
00 F0 FF F2 00 00 10 18
00 F0 FF F1 00 00 10 1A
00 F0 FF F2 00 00 10 1C
00 F0 FF F1 00 00 10 1E
00 F0 FF F2 00 00 10 20
00 F0 FF F1 00 00 10 22

00 F0 00

// 0x543C0 Getting Back up after an ouch landing
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 00 01 00 80 00 11 00 A0 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 22 08 00 00 23 F4 00 00 10 82 02 00 28 08
00 F0 FF F5 00 00 10 0B

00 F0 FF F8 00 00 10 30
00 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 00  
00 F0 00

// 0x545A4 Knocked into the air and then falling after?

// 0x54618 Getting hit normally and then getting back onto feet?
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 F6 01 00 60 00 02 00 08 00 11 00 0E 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 03 00 00 23 D8 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 04
00 F0 FF D9 00 00 10 08
00 F0 FF F5 00 00 10 10
00 F0 FF F6 00 00 10 12
00 F0 FF F7 00 00 10 14
00 F0 FF F8 00 00 10 00
01 F0 FF 00 00 00 01 34  
00 F0 00 To getup animation.

// 0x5467C Knocked into the Air?
00 
00 F0 FF 00 00 FF 00 00 01 11 00 A0 00 02 00 08 00 12 00 00 00 10 01 00 00 00 20 0F 00 00 22 04 00 00 23 E4 00 00 10 7A 02 00 28 02

// 0x5472C Start to jump back onto feet and initiate idle?

// 54A0C Respawn Icon
